Documents that get augmented after processing source documents
Documents generated from LLM responses (e.g., Excel files)
Uploaded files that are processed to extract information
Snapshot of document content at this version
FK to source_documents - original source file
FK to responses - the LLM response this document was generated from
FK to directus_files - the generated file
MIME type of the generated file
FK to source_documents - the document this response is for
The prompt sent to the LLM
The raw response from the LLM
